main event: A military observation reported a white light object descending from a high altitude in Estacado, Texas on June 10, 1954.
interesting points: The object was observed for 30 seconds,It traveled from west to east at a speed of 500-600 km/h,It made two 180-degree turns as it slowed down,The object blinked and then went out while descending near the ground,The conclusion of the sighting was probably astronomical.
